name: Chaos Arena (Brackeys Game Jam 2021)
description:
Fight forever in an alien arena against hordes of enemies of unknown origin.

They will keep coming, so you better keep running.

(Added a pistol to the game. Select between sword an pistol with '1' & '2' key)

(Added health and ammo pickups to extend your survivability)

(Currently audio sliders do not work, sorry)

This game was made for Brackey's  "Make a Game in a Week" Game Jam 2021 by our little team. It's a project we will definitely be continuing development for and continuously trying to make it a smoother and more enjoyable
